sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Heroes Way Designation Program Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Heroes Way Designation Program Act.

sections.heading: Purpose. This Act establishes a designation program, to be known as the "Heroes Way Designation Program", to honor the fallen Illinois heroes who have been killed in action while performing active military duty with the United States Armed Forces
